## From Our Family to Yours
Blending from multiple vineyards to create our West Hills signature Estate Pinot Noir. Let this be the taste that sparks memories for years to come of gatherings large and small enjoyed with those you love. Look for notes of crushed raspberries and macerated strawberries on the palette with a hint of hibiscus flower in this easy to drink Pinot Noir. 12.7% ALC/VOL
$38.00
[All wines are currently available  
for in-person sales only.
